title: Kajou Mousou Shounen
sinopse:
Ohno-kun's special skill is "hands-free masturbation"! With his own fantasy, he could ejaculate without touching himself. He spent a fulfilling school life like this. Then the popular guy of their class Kureshima, suddenly became close to him~~~?

Getting the girls around them involved in their desire and devices as they go through their youth.

(Source: Fafafap)
